text: Cal Wilson (5 October 1970 â€“ 11 October 2023) was a New Zealand stand-up comedian, author, radio and television presenter, She was based in Australia. Wilson had a Bachelor of Arts degree. She wrote the New Zealand sitcom Willy Nilly from 2001 until 2003. She had been in many comedy television programs. Wilson was the host of Sleuth 101 and voiced Petal and Thorn in the children's series Kitty Is Not a Cat. Wilson also co-hosted several radio programs. She died on 11 October 2023 at age 53 years old . == References == Category:1970 births Category:2023 deaths Category:New Zealand actors Category:New Zealand writers Category:New Zealand comedians Category:People from Christchurch
title: Cal Wilson
